title: Backend Development
description: Building robust and efficient backend systems using Node.js, Flask, and Express, with authentication, database integration, and RESTful APIs.

title: AI & Machine Learning
description: Developing practical AI solutions using Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow, including image classification, speech-to-text, and intelligent web apps.

title: Frontend Integration
description: Creating responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrating them with backend APIs for smooth user experiences.
